question: Do you prefer cooler or warmer climates?
Do you prefer to be indoors or outdoors?
Do you like to be around bodies of water or mountains?
Do you prefer to be in the city or countryside?
Do you prefer adventure or relaxation?
Do you prefer history or artistry?
Do you prefer fine or casual dining?
Are you looking for obscure finds or well-known vacation destinations?
Are you planning on traveling alone or with a group?
Would you prefer a quiet evening in or to take advantage of nightlife?
When you vacation, do you go to experience new things, or to focus on yourself?
When you vacation, do you see yourself in a museum or theme park?
When it comes to vacationing, are you someone who looks to save money, or looks to spend money?
Do you prefer to go on guided tours or explore at your own pace?
Do you prefer to travel around holidays or travel in off peak times?
When thinking about meals, are you looking for local cuisine or familiar locations?
Which sentence best describes the way you prefer to talk about your vacations? “You’ll never guess what I saw!” or “I had such a relaxing day!”
Are you looking for a weekend getaway or a longer vacation?
